SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.config

Class ServiceConfig

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.agms.config.ServiceConfig
@Configuration public class ServiceConfig extends Object
Unified configuration class for all services. This class consolidates all service bean definitions in one place, eliminating the need for separate configuration classes for each service type.
